system.summary: Create a common gadget such as a crossbow, lighter, lock, or trap.

description.value:
As a Rest Action, you can create one common gadget—two as a Long Rest Action. Each gadget can be made from Scrap Metal of an equal GP value:

  • A crossbow (Light, Hand, Heavy, or Repeating)
  • A hunting trap
  • A lighter
  • A lock
